channel.title: Charge?

item.title: Charge?
item.dc:creator: @Sessy_Pk3r Sessy Pk3r
item.description:
@Sessy_Pk3r wrote:

[quote=“jake645, post:5, topic:539742”][quote author=Sessy Pk3r link=topic=658582.msg4405315#msg4405315 date=1391788650]
In your CombatAssistant you would have to find where the god spell is and set your damage integer to randomize(30).
[/quote]
would this be it?

if(godSpells()) { if(System.currentTimeMillis() - c.godSpellDelay < Config.GOD_SPELL_CHARGE) { damage += 10; } }[/quote]

It should be. Just change 10 to 30 and see if it works.

Read full topic

item.title: Charge?
item.dc:creator: @cammyPVPftw cammyPVPftw
item.description:
@cammyPVPftw wrote:

How do i implement the “charge” spell to make it do the effect of maxing 30? I only found this in clickingbuttons…

[code=java]case 4169: // god spell charge
c.usingMagic = true;
if(!c.getCombat().checkMagicReqs(48)) {
break;
}

		if(System.currentTimeMillis() - c.godSpellDelay < Config.GOD_SPELL_CHARGE) {
			c.sendMessage("You still feel the charge in your body!");
			break;
		}
		c.godSpellDelay	= System.currentTimeMillis();
		c.sendMessage("You feel charged with a magical power!");
		c.gfx100(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[48][3]);
		c.startAnimation(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[48][2]);
		c.usingMagic = false;
        break;[/code]

Read full topic
